name: Ludum Dare 40: Economics the Game
description:
Controls:

WASD: Move

Mouse: Aim

Click: Shoot Coins. Be careful! It drains your score!

Edit: 

Known bugs: 

1. Can't turn off sound when you go back to the menu after playing

2. Misspelling on header (not really a bug but y'know)

3. Business men will sometime go over the overlay
